PICKUPBAG.TEXT: Take the blood bag from the medic, then put it in your trunk.

PUTBAGINTRUNK.TEXT: Press ~y~{Y}~s~ to put the blood bag in the trunk.

DRIVETODESTINATIONHOSPITAL.TEXT: Now drive to the hospital, they are already awaiting your delivery.

GRABFROMTRUNK.TEXT: Grab the ~r~blood bag~s~ with ~y~{Y}~s~ from the trunk.

GIVEBAGTODOC.TEXT: Now bring the bag to the doctor!
